TEXT.citation: Indigenous Languages Research and Development Foundation. (2020). 族語E樂園. https://web.klokah.tw/

S.FORM: Sndamac namu balay. Mprading ta da.
Tutuy! Thmuku!
Sndamac su balay mptusa.
Tlung.
Sndamac namu balay. Hyaun mnchaya rmngaw kari Sediq ka uqun tusaun mptusa diyax saya.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的賽德克語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say food in Sederik.

S.FORM: Klaun su mbahang ka tnsanan mptusa?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: Mptusa, ini mu klayi. Malu su rmngaw mntxan dungan?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: Ini mu qbhangi, ya su malu kbeyhing hari kari?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，您可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: Qita hini! Snoli ku smpu txan.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: Malu bay snpuwan namu.
S.TRANSL: Everyone read it out very well.

S.FORM: Spu txan dungan. Kbeyhing hari hnang.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: Mmlux. Iya squwaq.
Ngali ka patas namu.
Iyaq, mptusa.
Ngali ka impicu.
Mptusa, cnhungi ku madas impicu da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: Ngali ka ssrus.
Mptusa, cnhungi ku madas ssurus da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: Usa knbarux ssiyaw tnhiqan su muyas ka ssurus.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: Kbrxi ku ssurus haw?
Malix ta muyas da.
Muda hini ka ratuc snlhayan ta han, msturung ta babaw dungan.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: Ima su ka isu?
Watan Diro ku ka yaku?
Ima su ka isu?
Laqi ku Sudu Tada ka yaku, Kayku Sudu ka hangan mu.
S.TRANSL: 我是Sudu Tada的兒子，我叫Kayku Sudu。
I am the son of Sudu Tada, my name is Kayku Sudu.

S.FORM: Ima su ka isu?
Tnsanan ku na Siyac Bawah ka yaku, Dakis Torih ka hangan mu.
S.TRANSL: 我是Siyac Bawah的學生，我叫Dakis Torih。
I am a student of Siyac Bawah, and my name is Dakis Torih.

S.FORM: Ima ka hangan su?
Macu Nukan ka hangan mu.
Ima ka hangan tama su?
Yudaw Mona ka hangan tama mu.
S.TRANSL: My father’s name is Yudaw Mona.

S.FORM: Ima ka hiya?
Cili Pukuh ka hiya.
Qbsuran mu snaw ka hiya, Abu Nukan ka hangan na.
S.TRANSL: 他是我的哥哥，他叫Abu Nukan。
He’s my brother, his name is Abu Nukan.

S.FORM: Ima ka hangan na?
Locing Numin ka hangan na.
Bakun Piyang ka hangan na?
Iyaq, Bakun Piyang ka hangan na.
S.TRANSL: Yes, his name is Bakun Piyang.

S.FORM: Batu Suyan ka hangan na?
Uxay, Temu Ciray ka hangan niya.
S.TRANSL: No, his name is Temu Ciray.

S.FORM: Ima ka sediq way?
Sama Watan ka hiya. Swayi qridin bubu mu ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 她是Sama Watan。她是我的阿姨。
She’s Sama Watan. she’s my aunt.

S.FORM: Ima ka sediq way?
Dangi mu ka hiya, Bakan Watan ka hangan niya.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Bakan Watan。
She is my friend and her name is Bakan Watan.

S.FORM: Khnu kngkawas su da?
Maxal kngkawas mu da.
Khnu kngkawas niya ka hiya da?
Maxal dha kngkawas ka hiya.
Piya kngkawas ka tama su?
Mrimal kngkawas ka tama mu.
Piya ka tnswayi namu?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: Dha ka qbsuran mu mi, taxa ka swayi mu.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: Niqan ka qbsuran su snaw?
Uka ka qbsuran mu snaw.
Piya knhbrawan hiyi ka tnsapah namu?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: Spac knhbrawan hiyi ka tnsapah mu.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: Weynu ka sanun su muyas?
Wa ku mniq Karingko muyas.
Ima ka hiya?
Swayi tama mu ka hiya.
Wa qmpah manu ka mnswayi snaw bubu su?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: Keysacu ka hiya?
Ima ka sediq way?
Qbsuran mu qridin ka hiya.
Niqan qpahun ka qbsuran su qridin?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: Wa mniq byoing qmpah ka hiya?
Tnswayi ka ddha sediq way?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: Uxay, msdangi ka dhiya.
Sediq Tnpusu su ka isu?
Iyaq, Sediq ku ka yaku.
Sediq ka mnsdungus snaw su?
Iyaq, binaw Sediq ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 是，但是她是賽德克族的。

S.FORM: Mqaras bay ka tama su?
Kiya, mqaras balay kana ka tnsapah mu.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: Wada muyas ka swayi su qridin da?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: Iyaq, wada muyas ka hiya da.
Mkla rmngaw kari Sediq ka dswayi su?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: Iyaq, mkla rmngaw kari Sediq ka dhiya?
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: Piya knhbrawan ka tnswayi namu?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: Tturu nami hiyi ka tnswayi nami.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: Msupu su tama bubu mniq sapah ka isu?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: Iyaq, msupu ku tama bubu mu mniq sapah ka yaku.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: Msupu su tama rudan bubu rudan mniq sapah ka isu?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: Ini, ini ku psupu dhiya mniq sapah ka yaku.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn't live with them.

S.FORM: Msupu su ima msupu mniq sapah?
Msupu ku tama mi bubu mi qbsuran snaw ka mniq sapah.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: Kndadax su inu miyah?
Kndadax ku Toda miyah.
S.TRANSL: I am from the tribe of Duda.

S.FORM: Wa inu ka sapah su?
Wa mniq alang Ungu ka sapah mu.
S.TRANSL: Our home is in the Ungu Yanu tribe.

S.FORM: Wa mniq inu ka alang nniqan rudan su?
Wa mniq alang Snuwil ka alang nniqan rudan mu.
S.TRANSL: 我的故鄉在史努櫻部落
My hometown is in the Snozakura tribe.

S.FORM: Wa mniq inu ka alang namu?
Wa msdalih Bnuhur Rmdax Tasil ka alang nami.
S.TRANSL: 我們的部落都在白石聖山區域一帶
Our tribes are all in the White Rock Holy Mountain area.

S.FORM: So knuwan ka musa namu alang?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: Sngayan rbawan cida pa qulung ku musa alang.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: Yaku pa laqi ku Sediq.
Hmuya ka karac saya?
Pcriyu ka hidaw da, mtilux bay ka karac.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: Mskuy bay ka nganguc?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: Mskuy balay, plkusi ou hari lukus.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: Mtilux balay ka nganguc?
Ini, msbwihur da, mtltu balay ka karac.
Hmuya ka karac diyax saya?
Ini ktilux mi kskuy ka karac saya, mndungus balay.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac kman saya?
Uka rulung ka karac, pcriyu ka pngerah da.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac nganguc?
Hana msuwan, thidaw da, pcriyu ka Hakaw Utux da.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac isu hiya?
S.TRANSL: What's the weather like where you are?

S.FORM: Wisu msbwihur beyhing ka yami hini.
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: Ya mndungus ka karac isu hiya?
Malu balay, mthidaw beyhing bay ka hidaw.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: Musa ku sapah pyasan da.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: Mskuy balay ka karac, kou hari pnlkusan su lukus.
S.TRANSL: 天氣很冷，你要多穿衣服。
It's cold, you need to wear more clothes.

S.FORM: Musa ku nganguc da.
Mpquyux beyhing kiya da, iya chungi madas trasi.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: Mpquyux?
Nhana mbruwa, ya bay musa qmuyux kiya hari da.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: Wisu qmuyux da?
Qmnuyux ka soni, wisu msuwan ka saya da.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: Wisu qmuyux da?
So bay qmnuyux da, mhuriq ka elu beyhing.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: Qmnuyux? Ma mhuriq kana ka hiyi su?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: Wa qmuyux ka nganguc, ini ku adas trasi.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: Ya su wisu malu?
Beyhing bay ka bwihur, maku so mnarux bay ka tunux mu nyupan bwihur.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: Ya su wisu malu?
Beyhing bay ka hidaw, maku so mtnuyung balay ka tunux mu tnhdawan hiyaw.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: Cnhungi ku madas ingpicu da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: Kbrxi misu pa.
Cnhungi ku madas daquc da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: Ini ku adas uri, nta mari.
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.

S.FORM: Nta mari ingpicu haw?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: Mbari ku ssurus uri na.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: Nta mari uqun mrbu haw?
S.TRANSL: Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: Uxay, mnkan ku sapah da.
S.TRANSL: No, I've already eaten at home.

S.FORM: Cnhungi ku pstilux hndayu da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: Sani nhari pstilux pa!
Cnhungi ku madas hndayu da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: So kiya da u psupu ta mkan hndayu muda ha!
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: Mkan su manu ka cka hidaw?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: Mpkan ku uqun pnhapuy sapah pyasan.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: Mpkan su manu ka cka hidaw?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: Mnadas ku hndayu ka saya, psupu ta mkan ka cka hidaw pa!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!

S.FORM: Nta cnbu buru haw?
S.TRANSL: Let's go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: Nta cnbu rancyo haw?
S.TRANSL: Let's go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: Iyaq! Nta.
Nta cnbu buru haw?
Nta cnbu pangcyo haw?
Uxay, mpqita ku patas.
Dyawi ku mangal sksik.
S.TRANSL: Please help me with the broom.

S.FORM: Iyaq, bqani misu ka sksik ni.
S.TRANSL: Okay, here's a broomstick for you.

S.FORM: Dyawi ku mangal waliq ssurus(jyoking) haw?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the cloth?

S.FORM: Wisu ku smksik, plwani ka Ukan Rabay dmayaw sunan mangal.
S.TRANSL: 我在掃地，你叫Ukan Rabay幫你拿。
I'm sweeping the floor and you ask Ukan Rabay to carry it for you.

S.FORM: Mnhdu su smksik da?
Mnhdu ku smksik da.
Ma su ini sksik?
Wada ku mhdu smksik da.
Mrutiq ka dxral, hay smurus tikuh han.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: Iyaq, hay ku mangal waliq ssurus(jyoking).
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

S.FORM: Mrutiq balay ka bnlingan way, hay smurus tikuh han.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: Tawa han, ini ku qdu smksik ka hini na.
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.

S.FORM: Mphuya su ka kiya hari?
Mpmusa ku miying mptusa.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to see my teacher.

S.FORM: Mphuya su ka babaw mlatac sapah pyasan?
S.TRANSL: What do you do after school?

S.FORM: Mptuhuy ku dangi mu musa muyas uyas?
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: Mphuya babaw mlatac sapah pyasan ka hiya?
Musa tmapaq qsiya ka hiya.
Wa sapah ka Ayuc Watan?
S.TRANSL: May I ask if Ayuc Watan is home?

S.FORM: Wa sapah ka hiya, awah ckcka sapah.
S.TRANSL: She’s at home, please come in.

S.FORM: Wa sapah ka Sawa Watan?
Uka wah, niqan manu ka ddaun su?
S.TRANSL: 她不在，請問你有什麼事?
She’s not here, what can I do for you?

S.FORM: Ima su ka isu hu?
tama rudan, yaku Rabay Diro, rwahi ku rhngun.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, I’m Rabay Diro, please open the door.

S.FORM: Ima su ka isu?
Lubi, yaku Kumu Nawi, wisu ku miyah tuhuy sunan da.
S.TRANSL: Lubi Nawi，我是Kumu Nawi，我來找你玩了。
Lubi Nawi, I’m Kumu Nawi and I’ve come to play with you.

S.FORM: Bsiyaq ta ini tqita da.
Kiya wah! Lnglungun misu balay! Nhari miyah pprngaw ta kari pa!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let’s chat!

S.FORM: Tlung, mahi kal oyu.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and have a cup of tea.

S.FORM: Mhuway su balay.
Mahi kal ociya.
S.TRANSL: Please have a cup of tea.

S.FORM: Malu bay mmahun ka ociya namu.
Uqi ta hiyi pnwalang pa!
Iyaq wa! So knmalu bay qtan ka hhiyi pnwalang niyi.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些水果看起來很棒。

S.FORM: Malu uqun ka hiyi pnwalang?
Iyaq, balay bay malu uqun.
Mnhdu pchada uqun idaw kmanan ka bubu da, nhari miyah mkan pa!
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!

S.FORM: Iyaq, sani ku trima bawa.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go wash my hands.

S.FORM: Ququ mkan mi mimah, mbay su sediq icil da.
S.TRANSL: 盡量吃喝，你又不是外人。
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, you’re not an outsider.

S.FORM: Ou bay qnqan mu da, mtngi bay da.
S.TRANSL: I ate a lot, I’m full.

S.FORM: Kou hari uqun su, iya qsiqa.
Iyaq, malu bay uqun.
Mmusa ku da, miyah ku mita sunan nxal dungan.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，下次再來看你。
I’m leaving, I’ll see you next time.

S.FORM: Iyaq, swayay ta da.
Kman bay da, musa ku sapah da.
Awah tuhuy babaw dungan ha!
Knhuway musa.
Iyaq, niqan diyax su pa awah tuhuy sapah mu.
S.TRANSL: Okay, come to my house sometime.

S.FORM: Sndamac namu balay, mptusa ka madas yamu musa smluhay mi smiling rdrudan alang.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去部落訪問耆老們。
Hello everyone, today I’m taking you to the tribe to interview the elders.

S.FORM: Malu wah! Kasi ka mpprngaw ta nanaq kari Sediq ka rdrudan.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!我們要跟耆老們說我們自己賽德克族語。

S.FORM: Uxay ta biyaw dhuq da?
Uxay ta biyaw dhuq da.
tama rudan, wisu nami miyah qmita sunan da.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, we’ve come to see you.

S.FORM: Mkla namu rmngaw kari Sediq hay! Laway bay knmalu!
S.TRANSL: 你們會說賽德克語啊!真是太棒了!

S.FORM: Sndamac namu balay, mpwela yamu musa qnpahan tmukuy macu ka mptusa saya.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去小米田工作。
Hello everyone, today I will take you to work in the millet field.

S.FORM: Iyaq, mptusa.
Awah tbku mhiyu hini kana, iya chngi madas ka qqiya ddiyun qmpah.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來排隊，記得帶好工具。
Come and line up, remember to bring your tools.

S.FORM: Iyaq, mptusa, wa nami madas qqiya ddiyun qmpah kana da.
S.TRANSL: 是的，老師，我們都拿好工具了。
Yes, sir, we’ve got our tools.

S.FORM: Wisu ta dhuq da?
Ini dhuq na, thiyaq balay na.
S.TRANSL: Not yet, it’s still far away.

S.FORM: Usa cmuyuq qsiya ka isu.
Iyaq, yaku ka muda cmuyuq qsiya.
Usa mangal plwaqan qduda ka isu.
S.TRANSL: You go get the bird catcher.

S.FORM: Iyaq, yaku ka musa lmiwaq qduda.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go and catch the birds.

S.FORM: Sndamac namu balay, musa ta sanan mita ccamac ka saya.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，我們今天要去動物園。
Hello everyone, we are going to the zoo today.

S.FORM: Taway bay knmalu wah! Mphuya ta musa hu?
S.TRANSL: 好棒喔!我們要怎麼去呢?
Awesome! How are we going to get there?

S.FORM: Tapa ta rulu basu musa.
Blayaq tbku mhiyu kana, psramal ta mari kipu.
S.TRANSL: 大家排好隊，我們準備買票。
Everyone line up, we are ready to buy tickets.

S.FORM: Iyaq.
Brah u qduda, bukuy u quyu, sani nanaq sdmhaw qmita.
S.TRANSL: 前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。
There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

S.FORM: Mptusa, micu ku quyu wah.
Ini huya, so kiya da u usa qmita qduda.
S.TRANSL: It doesn’t matter, then you go and watch the birds.

S.FORM: Kingal jikang spngan da u awah ta msturung hini dungan.
S.TRANSL: 我們一個小時後回來這裡集合。
We’ll meet back here in an hour.

S.FORM: Iyaq, mhuway su balay mptusa.
Manu ka qnita su diyax saya?
Ou bay qntan mu quyu, kari bay ka qduda uri.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.

S.FORM: Nahari hari, mmusa ta da.
S.TRANSL: Hurry up, we have to go.

S.FORM: Tawa ku han, mowic bay ka qaqay mu.
S.TRANSL: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

S.FORM: Psupu ta musa tmapaq qsiya haw?
Iyaq wah! Nta pa!
Hbaraw bay sediq ka wisu tmapaq qsiya hini.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of people swimming here.

S.FORM: Rbuq bay ka qsiya hiya, tmapaq ta qsiya hini da malu da.
S.TRANSL: 那裡水很深，我們在這裡游泳就好。
The water is deep there, so we just swim here.

S.FORM: Hmnuya su miyah ka isu?
Mnksa ku miyah ka yaku.
Tnapa su rulu manu ka isu?
S.TRANSL: What kind of car did you take?

S.FORM: Tnapa ku basu miyah ka yaku.
Mnchuya su musa pnrhulan ka isu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to church?

S.FORM: Mriq rulu mapa knan msupu nami musa ka tama mu.
Hmnuya musa sapah pyasan kddiyax ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: How does he usually go to school?

S.FORM: Tapa cyeyyun musa sapah pyasan ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: He took the subway to school.

S.FORM: Mnchuya musa mari sama ka bubu rudan su?
S.TRANSL: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?

S.FORM: Mriq otobay musa mari sama ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.

S.FORM: Mphuya su musa Tao ka isu?
S.TRANSL: How are you going to get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: Mptapa ku asu ka musa Tao.
S.TRANSL: I want to take a boat to Lanyu.

S.FORM: Hmnuya musa Tao ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: How did he get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: Tnapa skoki musa Tao ka hiya?
Tnapa rulu manu musa Takaw ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?

S.FORM: Tnapa kawtyey musa Takaw ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.

S.FORM: Tnapa kisya musa Tayto ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: Iyaq, tnapa kisya musa Tayto ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

S.FORM: Tnapa kisya musa Tayto ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: Uxay, tnapa skoki musa Tayto ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

S.FORM: Niqan sanan tapa basu ka hini?
S.TRANSL: Is there a bus stop near here?

S.FORM: Niqan, msdurux musa da u kiya ka mpqita su ppaun basu da.
S.TRANSL: 有，往前走就會看到公車站了。
Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

S.FORM: Weynu ka ceyyun msdalih bay hini?
S.TRANSL: 離這裡最近的捷運站在哪裡?
Where is the nearest MRT station?

S.FORM: Uka ceyyun ka hini, wana haya ka malu su ppaun.
S.TRANSL: 這裡沒有捷運站，你只能坐計程車。
There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

S.FORM: Khnu diyax ka tapa basu dhuq sapah pyasan?
S.TRANSL: How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

S.FORM: 15 pungkang ka mpdhuq sapah pyasan.
Khnu diyax ka tapa kawtyey dhuq Taycyu?
S.TRANSL: 搭高鐵要多久時間會到臺中?
How long does it take to get to Taichung by THSR?

S.FORM: Kingal jikang ka mpdhuq Taycyu.
S.TRANSL: I will come to Taichung in an hour.

S.FORM: Bsiyaq balay ka mriq rulu musa Ulay?
S.TRANSL: Is it a long drive to Ulai?

S.FORM: Ya bay kingal jikang.
Khnu diyax ka tapa su ceyyun dhuq sapah mu?
S.TRANSL: 你搭捷運來我家要多久?
How long did it take you to come to my house by subway?

S.FORM: Kasi ka mpusal pungkang.
Mkla su muriq ddeynsya?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

S.FORM: Mkla ku mriq ddeynsya ka yaku.
Niqan ka otobay su?
Niqan kingal ka otobay mu.
Niqan ka otobay su?
Uka ka otobay mu.
Malu ku ppsiling kari sunan?
Malu, smruwa ku balay.
Malu ku ppsiling kari sunan?
Uxay ku, ini ttuku ka knkla mu.
S.TRANSL: Don't, I don't know much about it.

S.FORM: Niqan su diyax ka babaw cka hidaw? Knmusa ku qmita sunan, ya malu hu?
S.TRANSL: 你下午有空嗎?我想去拜訪你，可以嗎?
Are you free this afternoon? I'd like to visit you, is that OK?

S.FORM: Iyaq, twaun misu sapah mu.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll wait for you at home.

S.FORM: Niqan diyax su ka kusun? Iyux ku mpsiling sunan quri pnngalan kari pnsltudan Sediq.
S.TRANSL: 你明天有空嗎?我想請問你關於賽德克族的傳說故事。
Are you free tomorrow? I'd like to ask you about the saga of the Sedecks.

S.FORM: Musa ku lmiqu ka kusun, uka ku mniq sapah wah.
S.TRANSL: 明天我要去山上，我不在家喔。
I'm going to the mountains tomorrow, I'm not home.

S.FORM: Mbahang ku isu pa niqan balay knklanan su quri waya Sediq, knpsiling ku sunan.
S.TRANSL: 我聽說您對賽德克族的傳統習俗非常了解，想要請教您一下。
I've heard that you're very knowledgeable about the traditional customs of the Sedykes and would like to ask you a few questions.

S.FORM: Ini ttuku ka knklanan mu, binaw, qquwi ku cmiyuk kari.
S.TRANSL: 我所了解的不多，但是我會盡量回答。
I don't know much about it, but I will try to answer as best I can.

S.FORM: Ya ku malu psueyga? Kiya ka mndungus bay smku ndanan ta.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄影嗎?這樣以後比較容易記錄。
Can I record the video? It will be easier to record in the future.

S.FORM: Iyaq, malu hmi.
Khnu su kngkawas ka saya da?
Mngari kmxalan mspac kngkawas mu da.
Risaw su balay.
Uxay wah! Rudan ku bay da.
S.TRANSL: 沒有啦! 我已經很老了。

S.FORM: Kndadax su inu?
Kndadax ku alang Truwan.
S.TRANSL: 我來自alang Truwan德鹿灣部落。
I'm from the alang Truwan Deer Bay tribe.

S.FORM: Sediq uri ka qridin su?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的太太也是賽德克族人嗎?
Is your wife also a Sedek?

S.FORM: Uxay, Bunun ka hiya.
Mkla su rmngaw kari kinu?
Mkla ku rmngaw kari Sediq Toda mi kari Seejiq Truku mi kari Seediq Tgdaya.
S.TRANSL: 我會說賽德克族都達語和賽德克族德路固語 、賽德克族德固達雅語。
I will speak the Seddiac Dutta and the Seddiac Telugu and the Seddiac Telugu Daya.

S.FORM: Mqaras ku balay malu pssiling sunan ka diyax saya, brahaw su balay uda snrnu quri waya psaniq umaduk haw?
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下，有關狩獵的禁忌好嗎?
It's a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

S.FORM: Iyaq. Risaw ku cida pa knttu ku musa umaduk kddiyax.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我年輕的時候很常上山打獵。
Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

S.FORM: Mhuway su balay, laway bay knmalu ka tnsanan su diyax saya.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，您今天所教導的真是太棒了。
Thank you, what you taught me today was really great.

S.FORM: Balay bay balay ka rnngaw mu kari, lnutuc hniti snrnuwan kari rudan cbiyaw.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: Muda hini ka pprngawan ta. Mhuway su balay snrnuwan su kari.
S.TRANSL: 今天的訪談就到這邊。非常謝謝您的分享。
That's all for today's interview. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

S.FORM: Ini huya, uda ta pprngaw babaw dungan.
Musa ku da, so mpqbahang ou bay kluwanan snrnuwan kari ka nduray dungan.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，期待下次聽到更多的故事。
I'm going to leave now and look forward to hearing more stories next time.

S.FORM: Iyaq wah! Thuway musa.
Sndamac su balay, mpbari su manu?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what are you looking for?

S.FORM: Mpbari ku kingal mmahan pngerah.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a cup.

S.FORM: Sndamac su balay, mpbari su manu?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what are you looking for?

S.FORM: Mpbari ku kingal bunuh.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a hat.

S.FORM: Mpbari ku kopu, niqan ka sbari namu?
S.TRANSL: 我要買杯子，你們有賣嗎?
I want to buy a cup, do you sell them?

S.FORM: Niqan, piya ka briyun su?
S.TRANSL: Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Niqan sbiki ka bingro namu?
Uka, ini nami pbari sbiki.
S.TRANSL: No, we don't sell betel nut.

S.FORM: Mari ku buwax payay.
Piya lubuy ka briyun su?
S.TRANSL: How many packs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Bqani ku turu lubuy.
Mbari ku bunga.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Wada qdiyun pbari ka bunga da.
S.TRANSL: All the sweet potatoes are sold out.

S.FORM: Mpbari ku dha rusuq abura.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two bottles of oil.

S.FORM: Msngari nami kingal balay rusuq da.
S.TRANSL: We only have one bottle left.

S.FORM: Hay ku dmayaw mari balung.
Khnu toting ka briyun su?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Khnu cnhdilan toting ka briyun su balung?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Mbari ku dha toting.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two catties.

S.FORM: Mbari ku dha bnkiyan neygi.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: Msngari turu bnkiyan, sbuway misu kana da!
S.TRANSL: There are three left, all for you!

S.FORM: Khnu hbangan briyan ka kingal lubuy buwax payay niyi?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: Kingal lubuy u dha kbkuy klabuy.
Kana baray u mpusal kingal krtan pila, ana mpusal krtan pila da baka da.
Mhuway su balay.
Hini pa mngari kmxalan rima krtan pila.
Mpbari ku tikuh dungan, dhqun kbkuy klabuy.
S.TRANSL: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: Kana balay u rima kbkuy klabuy mi maxal krtan pila.
Ngali ku smpu rima kbkuy klabuy haw?
Scuqi mkray ka niyi da, malu sbari mhnuk hari?
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: Naqah, mhnuk balay ka niyi da.
S.TRANSL: 不行，這個已經很便宜了。
No, this is already very cheap.

S.FORM: Mangal ku kingal lnbuwan pingkan niyi.
S.TRANSL: I want this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: Mturul krtan pila ka emu ni, mbari su manu nina hu?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: Malu ku knbarux hbangan sunan?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Malu wah! Khnu ka ddiyun su?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How much do you need?

S.FORM: Cnhungi ku madas hbangan da, malu ku knbarux hbangan su?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Ini ku adas hbangan uri wah!
S.TRANSL: I don't have any money either!

S.FORM: Cnhungi ku madas pila da, malu ku knbarux pila su?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Uxay ku, ini su brnahi muway knan ka knbrxan su cnduray na.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: Malu ku knbarux lukus su?
Iyaq, ngali nanaq.
Malu ku knbarux patas su?
Wada mu kbrxan Tiwas Pawan da.
S.TRANSL: I lent it to Tiwas Pawan.

S.FORM: Kbrxi ku ddeyngsya su haw?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?

S.FORM: Iyaq, binaw brnahi ku hmaduc kusun dungan.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: Qmuyux da, ini ku adas trasi, kbrxi ku trasi haw?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me your umbrella?

S.FORM: Kingal balay ka trasi mu, psupu ta dmuwi pa!
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: Niyi ka patas knbrxan misu cnduray, sbrahun misu muway.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: Smatang su mita mmnnu patas na? Malu su srngaw knan kana.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書?您都可以跟我說。
What else do you want to read? You can tell me anything.

S.FORM: So knuwan ka brnahun misu muway hbangan?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: Ini huya, pprngaw ta niqan su hbangan nxal da.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It doesn't matter, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: Tbrnahun su muway knuwan ka hbangan mu?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: Tbrnahun misu muway kusun.
S.TRANSL: I'll return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: Tbrnahun su muway knuwan ka patas mu?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: Uxay misu tbrnahun muway ciwa dpa?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?
Didn't I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: Knbrxan su na Kurak Tanah ka impicu niyi?
S.TRANSL: 這支筆是Kurak Tanah借你的嗎?
Did Kurak Tanah lend you this pen?

S.FORM: Iyaq, knbrxan ku na saya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: Knbarux su Bawah Harung ka impicu niyi?
S.TRANSL: 這支筆是你跟Bawah Harung借的嗎?
Did you borrow this pen from Bawah Harung?

S.FORM: Uxay, bnari bubu mu ka niyi.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what my mom bought.

S.FORM: Uka timu da, usa knbarux Kumu Nawi tikuh han.
S.TRANSL: 沒有鹽了，去跟Kumu Nawi借點鹽。
We are out of salt, let's borrow some from Kumu Nawi.

S.FORM: Iyaq, sani mu knbarux han.
S.TRANSL: Well, I'll go borrow it first.

S.FORM: Plwani ka Trmi Puhuk, so ku na brnahun muway ka hbangan mu.
S.TRANSL: Go tell Trmi Puhuk to return my money.

S.FORM: Khnu ka wada su na kbrxan hbangan?
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?

S.FORM: Musa su inu?
Musa ku qnpahan mu mhuma sama.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: Wa su hmuya?
Kari bay ka spriq da, wisu ku tmatak, musa ku cmuyuq qsiya ka kiya hari dungan.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There’s too much grass, I’m cutting it, I’ll have to water it later.

S.FORM: Dyawi ku mangal kaul mi auc haw?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: Wa su pniqun inu?
Wa mu pniqun siyaw labah.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: Mnhdu su tmabul da?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: Nhana ku tmabul, kiya hari da u rmhak rhak da.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: Malu sqtun ka pnhuma su sama da?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: Malu sanan smqic ka tmana hini da, naqah sqtun ka sama Watan way na.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: Ibah! Laway bay ka bunga knriyan su.
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: Dyani ku pusa rpun binaw haw?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: Wa namu hmuya?
Wisu nami pkadi qmraq qcurux.
S.TRANSL: We’re releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: Kari bay ka qcurux hini?
Ou balay ka qcurux qnrapan nami wa ckcka kobu qcurux.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: Hmuya su mnchaya qmraq qcurux kddiyax ka isu?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: Dmuwi ku raqic qcurux meytaq qcurux ka yaku.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: Dmuwi su budi musa umaduk?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: Knttu ku pusa wasil snuyuk qmraq ccamac ka yaku, mncuwil ku madas puniq mi huling umaduk uri.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: Elu ndanan boyak ka niyi.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: Ma su mkla?
Dapin boyak ka niyi, kiya ka elu ddaun boyak ka niyi.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: Knllu ta musa qmita durang so bay wada tdiyan camac da.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: Ma su klaun?
So bay wa smknux ka huling da. Snuli ta musa nhari.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let’s follow them.

S.FORM: Manu ka wisu namu smlun saya?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: Dangar tasil ka ni, sqraq qolic kiya.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: Manu ka pnsanan su hiya?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: Wasil snuyuk ka tdiyan papak ccamac, ddiyun nami mangal pada.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: Qrasun balay ka Utux Tmninun snblayaq tnan, pndungus ou balay ka nangal ta ccamac.
S.TRANSL: 感謝編織之神賜福我們，賞賜我們今天有很多獵物收獲。
We thank the God of Weaving for blessing us with a great harvest today.

S.FORM: Balay kiya! Dsanay ta alang tblayaq msupu msasu ka malu hay!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享是好的!
Yeah! It’s good that we’re bringing it back to the tribe to share!

S.FORM: Yaku mptusa saya pa tsanun maku kari Sediq hmuya mchaya rmngaw ka ccamac.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家動物的賽德克語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in 3S3T language today.

S.FORM: Yaku mptusa saya pa tsanun maku kari Sediq hmuya mchaya rmngaw ka qqhuni pnwalang.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的賽德克語怎麼說。

S.FORM: Yaku mptusa saya u tsanun maku kari Sediq hmuya mchaya rmngaw ka hiyi pnwalang.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家水果的賽德克語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in 3S3T language today.

S.FORM: Iya taqi.
Iya squwaq.
Iya kan uqun.
Ngali ka patas su.
Ngali ka ingpicu su.
Ngali ka patas bntasan su.
Skuwi ka patas.
Skuwi ka ingpicu.
Skuwi ka uqun.
Stri ka pplahan.
Nima ka ingpicu ni?
Naku ka ingpicu ni.
Nima ka patas ni?
NaAwi ka patas kiya.
Nima ka ssurus ni?
Ini ku kla.
Lukus Teymu ka way?
Uxay, lukus oba Sawa ka ni.
Mptusa, ini ku adas patas.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.

S.FORM: Tuhuy siyaw tnhiqan su muyas msupu qmita.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: Wada stuq ka ingpicu mu da.
Kbarux tnhiqan su muyas han.
Wada uka ka ssurus mu da.
Kbrxi misu ssurus mu han.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: Mpalix ta muyas da, qhahang elu mmusa sapah!
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: Iyaq. Mhuway su balay mptusa!
Malix ta muyas da, knbiyax ta kana
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，大家再見！
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: Knbiyax! Mptusa.
Sndamac namu balay, Walis ka hangan mu.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Walis.

S.FORM: Sndamac su balay Walis.
Sndamac namu hangan mu u Takun.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Takun.

S.FORM: Takun, sndamac su malay.
Sndamac su balay, Pedang ku ka yaku.
Sndamac su balay Pedang, yaku pa hay Buwih hangan mu.
Sndamac su balay, Soruk ka hangan mu.
Soruk, sndamac su balay, Bakan ku ka yaku.
Ima su ka isu?
Bubu ku na Harung, Buwih ka hangan mu.
Ima su ka isu?
Swayi qridin ku na Watan ka yaku, Bakan ka hangan mu.
S.TRANSL: 我是Watan的妹妹，我的名字是Bakan。
I am Watan’s sister. My name is Bakan.

S.FORM: Ima ka hiya?
Mptusa mu ka hiya, hangan niya pa Harung.
Ima ka sediq way?
Qbsuran mu snaw ka hiya, Qaqung ka hangan na.
Dakis ka hiya?
Iyaq, hiya ka Dakis.
Basaw su ka isu?
Uxay, Pihu ku ka yaku.
Ima ka Tuday?
Yaku ka Tuday.
Ima ka Soruk?
Dangi mu ka Soruk.
Ima hangan niya ka qbsuran su qridin?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister’s name?

S.FORM: Hangan qbsuran mu qridin u Sama.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is Sama.

S.FORM: Ima ka hangan swayi su qridin?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister’s name?

S.FORM: Hangan swayi mu qridin pa Robaw.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister’s name is Robaw.

S.FORM: Klaun su ka hangan niya ?
Watan ka hangan niya.
Khnu kngkawas ka qbsuran su snaw da?
S.TRANSL: How old is your elder brother?

S.FORM: 15 kngkawas na da.
Piya kngkawas ka swayi su snaw da?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

S.FORM: 5 kngkawas na ka hiya da.
Niqan sapah pyasan ka alang namu?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?

S.FORM: Niqan.
Wa su muyas sapah pyasan alang ka isu?
S.TRANSL: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe’s school?

S.FORM: Iyaq, wa ku muyas sapah pyasan alang, mntna nami kingal tnsapah.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: Ima ka snaw way?
Swayi tama mu ka hiya.
Ima ka qridin way?
Qbsuran mu qridin ka hiya.
Ima ka laqi way?
Swayi mu snaw ka hiya.
Wa qmpah manu ka bubu su?
S.TRANSL: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: Wa mniq heytay ka hiya.
Wa qmpah manu ka tama su?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: Mptusa ka hiya.
Swayi su snaw ka hiya?
Uxay, dangi swayi mu snaw ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother’s friend.

S.FORM: Qbsuran su qridin ka hiya?
Uxay, swayi mu qridin ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: No, she is my younger sister.

S.FORM: Khnu knhbrawan hiyi sediq ka tnsapah na?
S.TRANSL: How many people in their family?

S.FORM: 5 hiyi knhbrawan ka tnsapah na.
S.TRANSL: There are five people in their family.

S.FORM: Piya hiyi laqi ka tnsapah namu?
S.TRANSL: How many children in your family?

S.FORM: Kana nami balay tnsapah u niqan 4 hiyi laqi.
S.TRANSL: There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: Piya hiyi ka swayi su?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Uka ka swayi mu snaw, niqan 3 hiyi ka swayi mu qridin.
S.TRANSL: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。
I don’t have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.

S.FORM: Piya ka qbsuran su snaw mi qridin?
S.TRANSL: How many older siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Uka qbsuran mu snaw mi qridin.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have any older siblings.

S.FORM: Piya hiyi tnswayi su snaw mi qridin?
S.TRANSL: How many siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Uka tnswayi mu snaw mi qridin.
Tnswayi namu ka yamu?
Iyaq, qbsuran mu snaw ka hiya.
Sediq Tnpusu namu ka yamu?
Iyaq, Sediq Tnpusu nami ka yami.
Sediq minjoku ka hiya uri?
Iyaq, Sediq minjoku ka hiya uri.
S.TRANSL: 是的，她也是賽德克族人。

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac saya?
Mskuy hari ka karac, mahi ou hari mtilux oyu.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。
It’s a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac saya?
Mtilux hari ka karac, mahi ou hari qsiya.
S.TRANSL: It’s a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac nganguc?
Beyhing ka hidaw, qlahang hndawan hidaw.
S.TRANSL: The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac nganguc?
Ou bay rulung, uka hidaw ka karac.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: Mphuya ka karac kusun?
So bay mosa uka hidaw ka kusun, ou rulung, sbwihur beyhing.
S.TRANSL: 明天好像沒有太陽，雲很多，風很大。
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac mmusa ta rmiwaw cida?
S.TRANSL: 我們出遊那天天氣如何?
How was the weather that day?

S.FORM: So bay mpskuy hari ka diyax cida, mlatac nganguc u kasi ka mlukus lukus oba.
S.TRANSL: 那天好像有點冷，出門要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: Mphuya ka karac diyax sngayan?
S.TRANSL: How’s the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: Ya bay mosa mdungus ka karac diyax sngayan cida.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: Mpquyux ka diyax mmusa rmiwaw cida?
S.TRANSL: 我們出遊那天會下雨嗎?
Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: Mpsuwan ka karac cida, ya bay uxay mpquyux.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，應該不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: Mpquyux ka diyax mmusa rmiwaw cida?
S.TRANSL: 我們出遊那天會下雨嗎?
Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: Iyaq, ya bay mpquyux ka diyax cida.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: Wa qmuyux ka saya?
Msuwan da, cnbu hidaw da.
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

S.FORM: Wisu qmuyux ka saya?
Qmuyux da, ini ku adas trasi.
S.TRANSL: It is raining and I don’t have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: Wa qmuyux ka nganguc?
Ini quyux ka saya, ya bay mpquyux ka babaw cka hidaw, musa nganguc pa adas trasi.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後可能會下雨，出門要帶傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.

S.FORM: Mpkskuy bay ka misan kawas hu?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: Iyaq, ya bay musa mskuy bay ka misan kawas, plkusi ou hari lukus.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天應該會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: Musa mtilux bay ka rbawan niyi.
S.TRANSL: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: Ya bay musa mtilux bay ka rbawan, kou hari nmahan qsiya.
S.TRANSL: 夏天可能會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: Snkuxul su srwasaw?
Snkuxul ku srwasaw, muxul bay ka karac.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡春天，天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: Snkuxul su krpuhan?
Ini ku hari skuxul krpuhan, ou bay sbwihur beyhing ka krpuhan.
S.TRANSL: 我不太喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don’t like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

S.FORM: Wada ku cnhungi madas patas da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the textbook.

S.FORM: Msupu ku isu mita patas.
Wada ku cnhungi madas ssurus da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the eraser.

S.FORM: Kbrxi misu.
Cnhungi su madas ingpicu da?
S.TRANSL: Do you forget to bring your pen?

S.FORM: Iyaq, kbrxi ku ingpicu su haw?
S.TRANSL: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

S.FORM: Manu ka uqun su cka hidaw?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for lunch?

S.FORM: Mpkan ku pang.
Knmkan su manu ka kman?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for dinner?

S.FORM: Kmkan ku idaw.
Mnkan su manu ka mrbu?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for breakfast?

S.FORM: Mnkan ku balung.
Mnkan su manu ka cka hidaw?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: Mnkan ku hiyi rodux.
Nta mtur boru.
Usa kramal isu han, sanun misu miying kiya hari da.
S.TRANSL: 你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.

S.FORM: Hayi ta tmapaq qsiya pa!
Malu wah! Tuhuy ta musa.
Msupu ta musa ppulah boru.
Uxay, hayi ta knama hmaqun patas han.
S.TRANSL: No, we have to carry books first.

S.FORM: Mnsus su rupun da?
Ini na, wisu ku sminaw pngerah.
S.TRANSL: Not yet. I am doing the dishes.

S.FORM: Snminaw su quwaq da?
S.TRANSL: Did you rinse out your mouth?

S.FORM: Mnsinaw ku quwaq da.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.

S.FORM: Snminaw su pngerah da?
Mnhdu ku sminaw pngerah da.
Ma su ini trima bawa na?
S.TRANSL: Why didn’t you wash your hands?

S.FORM: Trima ku kiya hari da.
S.TRANSL: I will wash my hands later.

S.FORM: Wa su hmuya ka soni?
S.TRANSL: What were you doing just now?

S.FORM: Mnusa ku miying mptusa.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: Malix su pyasan daw mphuya su?
S.TRANSL: What are you going to do after school?

S.FORM: Kasi ku msdurux musa sapah.
Malix pyasan daw mphuya ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: What is she doing after school?

S.FORM: Musa smluhay rmweri ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: Ayuc, wa su sapah hu?
Wa ku sapah, awah cka nhari.
Sawa, wa su sapah?
Uka hini Sawa wah! Ayuc ku ka yaku, niqan manu ddaun su? Miyah sapah ka Sawa daw tsaun mu.
S.TRANSL: Sawa不在家耶!我是Ayuc，有什麼事嗎? 回來我會轉告Sawa。
Sawa is not at home. I am Ayuc. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: Ima namu ka yamu?
Bubu rudan, yami u Trmi mi Kumu, dyawi nami rmawah rhngun!
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我們是Trmi 和 Kumu，幫我們開門!
Grandma, we are Trmi and Kumu, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: Ima namu ka yamu hu?
Awi ku ka yaku, miyah ku ming Temu ka yaku.
S.TRANSL: I am Awi, I am here for Temu.

S.FORM: Bubu rudan, nisu ku miyah mita sunan da.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: Bsiyaq su balay ini awah da, lnglungan misu balay.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了，我好想念你。
You haven’t been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: Ayuc, niyi ku miyah tuhuy isu ppulah da.
S.TRANSL: Ayuc, I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: Nhari miyah cka sapah, bsiyaq ku bay tmawa sunan da.
S.TRANSL: 快進來家裡，我等你好久了。
Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: Pnhuma mu ka bunga niyi, tlamay mkan binaw!
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看!
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

S.FORM: Chiya bay uqun ka bunga niyi.
S.TRANSL: The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: Awah! Pnhuma ka hiyi pnwalang niyi, tlamay mkan pa!
S.TRANSL: 過來!這是我種的水果，吃看看！
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: Chiya bay uqun ka hiyi pnwalang niyi.
Tlung! Pnhuma mu lhngay ini cyuqi noyaku ka niyi, tlamay mkan binaw!
S.TRANSL: 請坐! 這是我種的有機玉米吃看看!
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

S.FORM: N! Balay bay chiya mi malu bay uqun ka lhngay niyi.
S.TRANSL: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: Mkan su mudu?
Naqah ku mkan mudu ka yaku, mkan ku ringgo da malu da.
S.TRANSL: 我不能吃橘子，我吃蘋果就好。
I can’t eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.

S.FORM: Mkan su pang?
Iyaq, snkuxul ku mkan.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I like it very much.

S.FORM: Sqriyay misu pkan hiyi pnwalang haw?
S.TRANSL: Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: Mhuway su balay! Laway bay biyuq na ka hiyi pnwalang niyi.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: Bqani misu qsiya mimah.
S.TRANSL: I will bring you some water.

S.FORM: Mhuway su balay.
Kou hari qnnqan su, ou bay sama pnchada mu.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: N! Balay bay malu bay sknxan mi malu uqun.
S.TRANSL: Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

S.FORM: Kou hari qnnqan su, niqan ou ka hini niya na.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.

S.FORM: So kiya daw, uxay ku mpqsiqa da wah!
S.TRANSL: 這樣的話，我不客氣了喔!
I’ll make myself at home then.

S.FORM: Kou hari qnnqan su, niqan ou ka hini nina.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

S.FORM: Ou bay qnnqan mu da, naqah ku mkan da.
S.TRANSL: 我吃了好多，不能再吃了。
I ate a lot and couldn’t eat any more.

S.FORM: Yaku mptusa pa dsi maku lmiqu.
S.TRANSL: 老師我今天要帶你們去山上。
I will take you to the mountains today.

S.FORM: Rmngaw ka bubu u kari bay preykay ka lmiqu.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說山上有很多蚊子。
Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

S.FORM: Yaku mptusa u dsanay namu qnpahan.
S.TRANSL: 老師我今天要帶你們去田裡。
I will take you to the fields.

S.FORM: Musa ta tnburah ddxral hu?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to loosen the soil?

S.FORM: Mmosa ta inu ka saya?
Dsanun ta na ssiyaw yayung ka mptusa.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

S.FORM: Mmosa ta inu ka saya?
Dsanun ta niya qnpahan ka mptusa.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

S.FORM: Mpusa ta siyaw yayung ka saya hu?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the riverside today?

S.FORM: Uxay, dsun ta na lmiqu ka mptusa.
S.TRANSL: 不是，老師要帶我們去山上。
No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.

S.FORM: Mmosa ta lmiqu ka saya?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the mountains today?

S.FORM: Uxay wah! Musa ta qnpahan ka saya.
S.TRANSL: 不是喔!我們今天要去田裡。
No, we are going to the fields.

S.FORM: Mptusa, musa ta qmita manu ka ssiyaw yayung?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到河邊要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?

S.FORM: Msupu ta musa qmita tiyadan.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: Mptusa, musa qmita manu ka lmiqu?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到山上要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?

S.FORM: Musa ta mita tlaway.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see butterflies.

S.FORM: Manu ka ddaun ta musa qnpahan?
S.TRANSL: What are we going to do in the fields?

S.FORM: Musa ta qnpahan qmita pnhuma ta lhngay, qdahang niqan uyah mi tdiyung wah!
S.TRANSL: 我們要到田裡看我們種的玉米，要小心有螞蟻、蜜蜂唷!
We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

S.FORM: Mptusa! Musa ta tmapaq qsiya yayung?
S.TRANSL: 老師!我們要到河流游泳嗎?
Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?

S.FORM: Uxay, musa ta qmita tiyadan.
S.TRANSL: No, we are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: Mptusa! Musa ta qnpahan phuma sama?
S.TRANSL: 老師!我們要到田裡種菜嗎?
Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?

S.FORM: Musa ta tnburah dxral ka saya.
S.TRANSL: We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: Niqan tiyadan sskaya ka hiya.
Saya ka hana ku mita mnudus bay diyadan.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: Niqan tlaway ka sskaya hiya.
Ibah! Ibah! Snkuxul ku tlaway, malu bay qtan.
S.TRANSL: Ibah! Ibah! 我喜歡蝴蝶，很漂亮。
Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

S.FORM: Niqan tlaway sskaya ka hiya.
Uxay tlaway ka way, walu ka way.
S.TRANSL: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: Eniq hini iya usa thiyaq balay nniqan wah!
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看，不要到太遠的地方唷!
Come here and take a look. Don’t go too far!

S.FORM: Iyaq, uxay nami musa thiyaq balay nniqan.
S.TRANSL: 好，我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won’t go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: Iya uda tmalang, thuway mksa kiya ka ini uda skribuc.
S.TRANSL: 不要用跑的，慢慢走免得跌倒了。
Don’t run and walk slowly lest you fall down.

S.FORM: Iyux ku nhari qmita.
S.TRANSL: I want to see them right away.

S.FORM: Hmuya su mchaya musa beywi hiya ka isu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to the block-house?

S.FORM: Mriq ku rulu musa.
Mnchuya musa byoing ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: How does he go to the hospital?

S.FORM: Mnksa musa byoing ka hiya.
Mnchuya su musa Pnghu ka isu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: Pnapa ku skoki ka musa Pnghu.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by plane.

S.FORM: Mnchuya su musa Pnghu ka isu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: Pnapa ku asu ka musa Pnghu.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: Tnapa su manu ka musa sapah?
Tnapa ku cyeyyun ka musa sapah.
Tnapa manu musa sapah pyasan ka Tapas?
S.TRANSL: How does Tapas go to school?

S.FORM: Tapa kisya musa sapah pyasan ka Tapas.
S.TRANSL: Tapas goes to school by train.

S.FORM: Tapa manu musa pnrhulan ka Sudu?
S.TRANSL: How does Basaw go to church?

S.FORM: Mriq ddeyngsya musa pnrhulan ka Sudu.
S.TRANSL: Sudu goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: Tapa su cyeyyun musa sapah pyasan ka isu?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: Uxay, tapa ku basu musa sapah pyasan ka yaku.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: Mriq su ddeyngsya musa sapah pyasan ka isu?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: Iyaq, mriq ku ddeyngsya musa sapah pyasan ka yaku.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: Tapa su kawtyey musa Takaw ka isu?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: Iyaq, tapa ku kawtyey musa Takaw ka yaku.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: Musa Tayto pa tapa su kisya ya skoki?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: Tapa ku skoki, tapa skoki mi kisya u nuqu ini biyaw ka tapa skoki.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: Musa su pnrhulan pa tapa su basu ya mriq rulu?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: Mriq ku rulu ka musa pnrhulan, mriq rulu mi tapa basu pa nuqu mslxan ka mriq rulu.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: Bbriyan cawsu u msdalih sapah namu?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: Ini sdalih, mriq ku otobay musa briyan Cawsu.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: Msdalih sapah pyasan ka sapah yobing?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: Msdalih balay, mksa da u kiya ka mpdhuq da.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: Msdalih ppanan rulu ka sanan mkan idaw?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: Mlatac ppanan rulu da u mksa 5 pungkang daw kiya ka dhuq da.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: Niqan diyax su saya?
Hmuya pa?
Smatang ku musa mying sunan.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: Niqan ddaun mu uka ku sapah saya. Babaw da haw!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家。改天吧！
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: So kiya u niqan ka diyax su kusun pa? Yahun misu mying kusun da.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: Malu, twaun misu sapah.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: Malu ku phnang hnang su? Yuxun mu mbahang mi matas.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: Malu wah! Ini huya.
Malu psueyga?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: Ini ku so mndungus qtan, ini ndwani smtur ka soko uri, iya ta haw!
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，我們不要啦!
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: So kiya daw psasing ku da malu da.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: Iya psasing uri.
Mhuway su balay! Srwanun su ka knan muda smiling sunan.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝您! 願意讓我訪問您。
Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: Ini huya, iyux su mpsiling manu?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: Risaw su cida han pa manu ka qpahun su?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: Keysacu ku cuxan han, binaw wada ku msangay qpahun niyi ka saya da.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: So kiya u wa su qmpah ka saya na?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: Wa ku qmpah sapah pyasan ka saya.
Wa mniq alang ka llaqi su uri?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: Ini, wa mniq alang mkbrnux kana ka llaqi mu.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: So kiya daw murux su nanaq mniq sapah?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: Tmabu ku kingal huling mi kingal qduda uri na, tnsapah mu ka dhiya uri.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: Tmabu ku kingal ngiyaw nina, niqan tnbuwan ka thiqan pa ini ksdamac.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: Iyux ku mpsiling sunan quri pnwaya umaduk.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: Ini knou ka knkla mu, banaw klaun mu duma u cyukun misu kana.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: Qqiya ddiyun namu umaduk pa niqan manu ka pnwaya namu?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: Qqiya ddiyun nami umaduk pa naqah tlngun qridin.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女性碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: So kiya u malu msupu musa umaduk ka qridin?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: Naqah! Naqah musa umaduk ka qridin.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Awi, ddiyuc pciyus damac ka sinaw micyo, uka sinaw micyo ka sapah da, usa mari sinew micyo.
S.TRANSL: Awi，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Qabus, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: Niqan 1 rusuq ka pchdanan nina, ana ini bari pa!
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: Ini tuku ka 1 rusuq, usa mari 2 rusuq dungan.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: Mari ku sinaw micyo, niqan namu pbari?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: Niqan hmi! Khnu ka briyun su?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: Mari ku 2 rusuq, mari ku 1 lubuy buwax uri.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: Ni ka buwax, manu niya na ka briyun su dungan?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: Mari ku balung dungan, niqan namu pbari uri?
S.TRANSL: 我還要買蛋，你們也有賣嗎?
I want to buy eggs, do you sell them too?

S.FORM: Wada qduwan mari ka balung nami da.
Mari ku lukus.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: So mnmnu ka sntangan su?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: Mari ku butun ucux na lukus.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka mbanah lukus niyi?
Niqan ini pntna kluwanan rakaw niya?
Niqan nami rakaw mbhuway mi rakaw mcays mi rakaw tmkarac na.
S.TRANSL: 我們還有白色、黃色和藍色。
We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: Bqani ku 1 lukus rakaw tmkarac.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Teymu, mnusa su inu ka soni? Mnusa su pskbiyax hiyi?
S.TRANSL: Teymu，你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
Teymu, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: Uxay, mnusa ku dmayaw bubu rudan mu pbari sama.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: So kiya hay! Niqan diyax su kman saya? Supu ta mkan idaw haw?
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊！你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯？
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: Naqah! Musa ku mari lukus.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: Snolun misu musa.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: Sndamac su balay, khnu pila ka sama niyi?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: 20 krtan pila ka 1 sama.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: Piya pila ka bunga niyi?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: 30 krtan pila ka 1 king bunga.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: Biqi ku 2 bnkiyan sama mi 1 tuting bunga.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Sudu, cnhungi ku madas ingpicu da, malu su skbarux knan?
S.TRANSL: Sudu，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Sudu, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: Uka ka naku uri, na Ayuc ka ingpicu niyi.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is Ayuc’s.

S.FORM: Kbrxi mu tnayis han haw? Uxay mu biyaw subway sunan dungan.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: Iyaq, dsi.
Mhuway su balay, dyawi ku rmngaw ka Ayuc uri.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Ayuc for me.

S.FORM: Manu ka sntangan su?
Miyah ku tbrinah muway 2 patas ni.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: Iyaq, manu dungan ka sntangan su na?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: Mpkbarux ku 3 patas niyi.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: Mhdu da. Iya chngi mk3 diyax daw yahi tbrinah muway dungan.
S.TRANSL: 好了。記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: Ini su sbway knan ka ssurus nina.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: Tna misu tbrnahun muway ciwa da.
Ma wada uka ka ssurus mu da.
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: Ya su wada kbrxan Trmi da.
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to Trmi?

S.FORM: Ini ku kla. Hayi mu smiling ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: Kbrxi misu ka ssurus mu han.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Sawa, knbrxan su na Ukan ka pnlkusan su lukus jyanba niyi?
S.TRANSL: Sawa, did Ukan lend you this coat?

S.FORM: Uxay, bnari ku na bubu mu ka niyi.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: Mntna nisu ka lukus jynba na Ukan.
S.TRANSL: Ukan’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: Mqalux ka lukus jynba niya, ini pntna rakaw nami.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Kumu, knbarux su hbangan Pawan?
S.TRANSL: Kumu, did you borrow money from Pawan?

S.FORM: Niqan, ida mu tbrnahun muway saya, wada ku cnhungi madas pila da.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: Tbrnahun su muway knuwan?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: Tbrnahun mu muway kusun ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: Iyaq, dyaun misu rmngaw ka Pawan.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Pawan for you.

S.FORM: Kasi ka dmuwi dangal btunux qmraq ka qolic, tkurih u dmuwi serak qmraq ka malu, so ka beyhing ccamac pa, kasi ka dmuwi durang ka malu, so kiya ka mndungus.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: Kla bay so kiya, wada ku qnuqu da! Kiya ka ini mu bay dhqi qmraq.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: Tsani misu ssalu dangal mi serak mi durang nduray da.
S.TRANSL: 我下次再教你怎麼製作這幾種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: Malu wah! Laway bay knmalu kiya da! So kiya daw mpanganl ku ccamac nxan da.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: Knbrawan bay ka spriq qnpahan da, sani mangal ka soki skuwan qqiya, nta qnpahan.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: Wa psanun inu ka soki?
Wa mniq siyaw brunguy, musa su kcka skuwan qqiya daw kiya ka qtaun su da.
S.TRANSL: 在圓簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: Qdahang mangal, iya qluqah, mhungun balay ka soki.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要受傷，鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: Iya tuqu qmqah durang mu!
Winu ka durang su?
Wa mniq trahuc qhuni way ka durang mu.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: Ma su klaun bay?
Niyi hini ka pnskrayan mu, klaun mu winu ka durang mu.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: Niyi ka kobu qcurux, psaun nami siyaw yayung tnqcurux.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: Uka nami kobu ka yami hiya, pngahi nami mangal qcurux ka yami.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: Uxay ku dnuwi ngahi ka yaku, tsani ku nduray da haw?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: Malu wah! Psupu ta musa pngahi nduray da.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: Tsanun misu smmalu kobu nduray da.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: Wa lmlu ka bhniq ngahi su da, ya wisu tdiyal qcurux da! Bbili nhari.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: Kiya hari da, scuqi lmlu ka asu da. Mniq ku hini bnbil bhniq ngahi, usa hnali way dyawi ku mangal ka ami.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: Sani bnbil yaku hini ka qcurux. Dyaun misu bnbil.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊。我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: Taway bay knmalu wah! Kari bay nngalan saya, htngay kana ka lubuy qcurux da.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: Sanay ta musa nhari msupu psasu kana ta.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: Ni ka mptusa da.
Iya ppulah da, Nhari tlung wakac.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: Ini balay klayi, scuqi ku da!
Nhari miyah truma.
Tupiya diyax iyax sngayan ka saya?
Nan yobi ka saya?
Turima diyax iyax sngayan ka saya, msangay ka kusun, psupu ta musa ppulah pa!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It's Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let's go out and play together!

S.FORM: Kingyobi ka saya, msangay ka kusun, psupu ta musa ppulah pa!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It's Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let's go out and play together!

S.FORM: Malu wah! Nta ssiyaw yayung.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let's go to the riverside.

S.FORM: Piya diyax iyax sngayan ka kusun?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: Nan yobi ka kusun?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: Tuturu diyax iyax sngayan ka kusun, nta ppulah boru ka babaw cka hidaw kusun pa!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let's go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: Mphuya su ka mrbu kusun?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: Diyax sngayan ka kusun, tuhuy ku bubu mu musa pnrhulan.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: Wa su hmuya da?
Knpbrih ku, musa ku nganguc han.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Mtnuyung bay ka tunux mu.
Pquri truma ka dqras mi hiyi su msangay.
Mptusa, mnarux nbuyas mu, musa ku san nganguc.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Iyaq, nhari musa.
Malu ku musa trima bawa hu?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: Uxay biyaw msangay snlhayan da, usa kiya hari da.
S.TRANSL: It's almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: Mptusa, mnarux bay ka tunux mu, mpsangay ku ka babaw cka hidaw han.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
Teacher, I have a severe headache. I need to take a sick leave in the afternoon.

S.FORM: Iyaq, qlahang mmosa su sapah.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: Mptusa, mpsangay ku ka tukingal diyax iyax sngayan, mmosa ku pqita ising.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: Iyaq, ndwani qmlahang ka hiyi su.
Wa inu ka Ayuc?
Mnarux ka nbuyas na, wa mniq san nganguc ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She's in the restroom.

S.FORM: Weynu ka Pawan?
Mptusa, mnarux welu na ka Pawan, msangay ka diyax saya.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, Pawan has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: Ma uka miyah ka Sawa saya?
Wisu neycu ka hiya da.
Pkla yaku nanaq.
Watan Nukan ka hangan mu, maxal kngkawas mu ka kawas ni.
S.TRANSL: My name is Watan Nukan, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: Ima ka hangan su?
Temu Nawi ka hangan mu.
Laqi su minjoku ima ka isu?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: Laqi ku Sediq minjoku ka yaku.
Sediq tnpusu kana ka tnsapah su hu?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Iyaq, Sediq blbalay kana ka tnsapah nami.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是賽德克族人。
Yes, my whole family is Sediq.

S.FORM: Sediq tnpusu kana ka tnsapah su hu?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Uxay, Sediq minjoku ka tama mu, sediq Holo ka bubu mu.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是賽德克族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Sediq, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: Laqi su ima ka isu?
Laqi ku Watan Nukan ka yaku.
Way ka tama su hu? Khnu kngkawas na da?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Mturu kmxalan kngkawas na da.
Way ka tama su hu? Khnu kngkawas na da?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Uxay, rudan tnualang nami ka hiya, mspac kmxalan kngkawas ka hiya da.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: Piya kngkawas na ka qbsuran su snaw da?
Maxal mspac kngkawas na ka qbsuran mu snaw da.
Mabang balay kngkawas su ka qbsuran su snaw hu?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: Mabang rima kngkawas mu ka hiya.
Khnu ka knreykun su?
Kbkuy spatul seyntmider ku ka yaku.
Bsiyaq ta ini tqita da, wada su mreykun da hay?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: Kiya hmi, wada ku kbkuy mturul sentmider da.
Ya su wada qthur da?
Ini, wa su tuqu mita da.
Wada su mliwang dhu?
Ini, wada ku qthur da.
Wada su qthur dhu?
Iyaq, mturul kiro ku ka saya da.
Musa su inu?
Musa ku nniqan qpahan mptusa ming mptusa.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: Musa ku ofis ming mptusa.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: Musa inu ka Temu?
Musa qmada sudu ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: Wa inu ka Ukan?
Wa san tmapaq qsiya ka hiya, musa pnsung tmapaq qsiya ka hiya kiya hari da.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: Wa inu ka Sawa? Muda pnsung tmalang ka hiya kiya hari.
S.TRANSL: Sawa在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Sawa? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: Wa mniq psliyanan ka hiya, sanun mu lmawa ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: Psupu ta musa tlaman pa.
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: Hayi ku mari uqun cka hidaw han, miyah ku ming isu kiya hari da.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: Psupu ta musa kmudaw hndayu pa!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: Usa ming sediq, musa ku ming mptusa.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: Musa pnsung cnbu boru tuting ka Sudu saya hu?
S.TRANSL: Is Sudu competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: Uka, mmosa pnsung storing ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: Musa su pnsung ka undokay cida hu?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Kiya hmi, musa ku pnsung tmalang.
Musa su pnsung ka undokay cida hu?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Musa ku pnsung boru tuting.
Manu ka owda ta undokay cida?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: Muda ta pnsung blbil wasil.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: Pbari ta uqun ka undokay hu?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: Uxay, pbari ta yupun.
Wada su mangal ici bang ka isu hay, mbiyax su balay!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: Mhuway su balay.
Wa sapah ka bubu rudan hu?
Wa sapah, wa mniq cka tqiyan mtaqi ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: Wa sapah ka bubu rudan hu?
Uka sapah, hana wada nganguc ka hiya, kasi ka kman da u kiya ka miyah sapah.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: Wa mniq sapah ka tama ruda hu?
Wa mniq tudha tkadan sapah ka hiya, usa baraw ming hiya pa.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: Niqan sediq ka sapah hu?
Ukan hay, bsiyaq su ini qtayi da, sndamac su balay, ya su malu hu?
S.TRANSL: 是Ukan阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Ukan. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: Malu ku balay wah! Miyah ku ming sunan pprngaw kari.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: Weynu ka tama su?
Wa mniq pchdanan pciyus sama ka hiya, haun mu lmawa ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: Wada inu ka Lubi da?
Wada kadu rodux qmraq rodux ka hiya da.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: Tama rudan, mmeyyah nami da.
Uka sapah ka tama rudan namu, wa mniq qnpahan ka hiya, hay tmawa sapah ka hiya pa.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: Swayi tama, ni su da hay!
Bsiyaq ta ini tqita da, wada su mdakil da.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: Mqaras ku balay qmita ku isu miyah tuhuy.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: Ni ka kalac sbuway munan, pniqi kcka kulu huda.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: Bsiyaq su balay ini awah da, plwanun mu ka dhiya msupu ta mkan idaw kana.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: Iya psramal ana manu da, mimah ku ocya da malu da, mniq ta cka dxral sapah pprngaw kari.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: Mhuway su balay snbliqan su, mmosa ku da.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: Hana wada mhdu smipaq ka rodux ni, dsi isu thwani mkan.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: Prngaw ku sunan sturung ta babaw cka hidaw kasun dhaw?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: Malu, prngaw ta sturung inu?
Prngaw ta sturung sapah pyasan haw? Muda ta psueyga.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: Nta psliyanan alang dhnu, mplukus ku lukus ta Sediq.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: Malu balay qtan ka phpah snuwil alang nami. Mphpah cida daw awah ming knan pa!
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: Asi ka twaun dhuq srwasaw da, sqcuqi balay kiya da wah!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: Awah “Smratuc” cida ka isu dpa!
Malu wah! pcmiyah ku balay!
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: Ma su thdil musa mniq alang ka isu?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: Musa ku tmsa laqi muyas.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: Hmuya su ini eniq alang mkbrnux tmsa laqi muyas?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: Alaw lnglungun mu balay ka alang mu, smatang ku cmiyuk unhuway alang uri.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: Mkla su balay tminun, ima ka tmnesa sunan?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: Bubu rudan mu ka tmnesa knan, hiya ka mkla balay tminun alang nami.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: Ma su knsluhay tminun?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: Wowaya nami ka tminun, yuxun mu pltudun dungan ka wowaya.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: Malu balay mahan ka sinaw macu ni.
Qnepi mu nanaq wah!
Mkla su balay ka isu, bsiyaq balay ka smmalu sinaw macu hu?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: Ini qbsiyaq balay, ya bay dha iyax sngayan (nisyokang) da u malu da. Playun mhapuy ka dhquy mi macu, malun tamul prmaxun dungal, kiya ka malu psaun liwas da.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約兩個禮拜就好了。把糯米和白米先蒸熟，再加入麴粉一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about two weeks. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.

S.FORM: Niqan manu ka sbari su?
Niqan ucik mi qucun ka yaku hini, pnhuma mu nanaq kana wah!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: Briyun kana ka dha u khnu pila?
Kana balay pa dha kbkuy mrimal pila.
Smkuxul ku lukus ni, piya pila?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: Rima kbkuy pila ka lukus ni.
Mkray balay da, malu mhnuk hari hu?
S.TRANSL: It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: Naqah, mhnuk balay daw ini tuku ka sntkuwan mu da.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: Iyaq wa! So kiya daw mari ku lukus mqalux way.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: Mari ku yayu ni mi cbracan ni.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: Kana balay u mpusal kbkuy klabuy, smnalu mu bawa nanaq ka ni, qulung musa malu bsiyaq ddiyun.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: Pkla ku dangi mu miyah mari, ya malu mhnuk hari dungan hu?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: Iyaq wa! Dyaun misu skhnuk mspac kmxalan paseynto.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’ll give you a 20% discount.

S.FORM: Awah qmita wah! Niqan briyan kana ka lukus mi bunuh.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: Khnu pila ka lukus?
Kingal ka lukus pa turu kbkuy mrimal pila, turu lukus da u maxal kbkuy pila.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: Mari ku kingal daw kiya da, brahaw su balay bqani ku burah.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: Sndamac su balay, iyux ku mari hlama sukay mi siyang mqri.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買紅豆糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy red bean sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: Wada qduwan mari da. Niqan ku emu sangas nina, mbari su hu?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: Iyaq wah! Brahaw su balay, biqi ku kingal, miyah ku mari hlama sukay ka nduray dungan.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買紅豆糯米飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: Iyaq, dyaun misu lmabu lubuy kapa, so ni u mrimal krtan pila.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
